name: Jimmy's funky sneakers
description:
A small game I made for the GMTK 2020 game jam. Your objective is to reach the green animated platform as many times as possible before the time runs out. Each time you do a new modifier is added which makes the game harder to control.

The coins add time to the clock, the bullets doesn't kill you and since the game is super buggy you can hold [lCtrl] to move the player back to the start.

Credits:

Programming and art: me
Music: Eric Matays www.soundimage.org
